title: Zino Platinum Exclusive New Hampshire Launch
itunes:title: Zino Platinum Exclusive New Hampshire Launch
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… The Cigar Authority debuts the Zino Platinum Exclusive Series New Hampshire which is exclusive to Two Guys Smoke Shop. We catch up with URNY, the artists of the project. They were scheduled to be in studio as part of a big event, but with COVID-19 things change. Mike Baca (2ESAE) joins us from Puerto Rico and Fernando Romero (Ski) from New Jersey for the first half-hour as we smoke the cigar that was part of The Cigar Authority Prime.

During the course of the show we discuss what cigar we wish we could put away and smoke 25 years later. We received a lot of feedback about last weeks cigar and one of the common questions is what cigars would you like to put away. Dave, Mr. J, Barry & Ed Sullivan share their thoughts as we smoke a Back 2 Back Nicaragua which was also part of the care package. We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
